sn27.5:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. "Yo, bhikkhave, cakkhusamphassajāya vedanāya chandarāgo, cittasseso upakkileso. Yo sotasamphassajāya vedanāya … yo ghānasamphassajāya vedanāya … yo jivhāsamphassajāya vedanāya … yo kāyasamphassajāya vedanāya … yo manosamphassajāya vedanāya chandarāgo, cittasseso upakkileso. Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno … pe … abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyesu dhammesū"ti.
